page.title: 18LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN WARE
page.content: {Hertford and Ware Athletics Club:} Every Thursday there is an athletics club at Chauncy School from 6.00p.m. until 8.00 p.m.You can do high jump,shot put,discus,javelin,running and lots of other things.Sometimes there are meetings and we have to go to a sports ground.On Sunday,16th June we went to Watford to compete against other clubs. {Ware Football Club}was formed in 1892 and has won many major honours.The last trophy the club won was in 1974 with the East Anglian Cup.Recently Ware F.C. applied for re_election to the Servowarm Isthmian League,Division Two.They got it and the league was re_named the Vauxhall Opel League.Ware's local rivals,Hertford F.C. were relegated to join Ware in Division Two.
